text:
@realDonaldTrump Approximately 2.7 million Americans died in 2018. 

Last week's Imperial College study forecast 2.2 million Americans dying if nothing is done to mitigate/suppress the coronavirus spread. 

Trump's plan would reduce that number a li'l bit.

Me? I'm gonna listen to the scientists.
